Template Function coll_theta_22¶

  • Defined in File physical_parameterizations.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t = codi::RealReverse>
float_t coll_theta_22(particle_model_constants_t<float_t> &pc1, particle_model_constants_t<float_t> &pc2, const uint64_t n)¶

Function for collision integrals of Seifert & Beheng (2006), Eq. 92.

Return

Parameters

  • pc1: Model constants for a particle type that is being collected

  • pc2: Model constants for a particle type that collects

  • n: from Eq. 92
